name: frostwire-desktop-6.9.9-build-313
body:
# frostwire (6.9.9) stable; urgency=high
  * [jlibtorrent 1.2.17.0](https://github.com/frostwire/frostwire-jlibtorrent/releases/tag/release%2F1.2.17.0) (boost 1.80, openssl 1.1.1q)
  * dev: gradle 7.5.1 upgrade
  * jlibtorrent: libtorrent update to RC_1_2 b5873f23b40ef9054b2bd6a4db2a2d327a56d4b1
  * lt:fix wanted_done/done accounting when force-rechecking
  * lt:expose userdata via torrent_handle (back-port from 2.0)
  * lt:fix renaming of filenames that are too long for the filesystem
  * lt:made UPnP and LSD code avoid using select_reactor
  * lt:fixed tracker connections spinning when hostname lookups stall
  * lt:fixed error in pkg-config file generation in Jamfile
  * lt:improve backwards compatibility with loading magnet link resume files
  * lt:fix bind-to-device for tracker announces and UPnP
  * lt:rename peer_tos setting to peer_dscp
  * lt:fix bdecode support for large strings (>= 100 MB)

 -- FrostWire Team <contact@frostwire.com>  Sun, 11 Sep 2022 15:20:00 -0600

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-desktop-6.9.9-build-313/frostwire-6.9.9-x86_64.dmg/download)

name: frostwire-android-2.6.1-build-706
body:
# FrostWire 2.6.1 build 706 - SEP/11/2022
 - jlibtorrent 1.2.17.0 upgrade
 - Android NDK r25b
 - jlt:boost 1.80 upgrade
 - jlt:openssl 1.1.1q upgrade
 - jlt:gradle 7.5.1 upgrade
 - libtorrent update to RC_1_2 b5873f23b40ef9054b2bd6a4db2a2d327a56d4b1
 - lt:fix wanted_done/done accounting when force-rechecking
 - lt:expose userdata via torrent_handle (back-port from 2.0)
 - lt:fix renaming of filenames that are too long for the filesystem
 - lt:made UPnP and LSD code avoid using select_reactor (to work around an issue on windows in boost.asio < 1.80)
 - lt:fixed tracker connections spinning when hostname lookups stall
 - lt:fixed error in pkg-config file generation in Jamfile
 - lt:improve backwards compatibility with loading magnet link resume files
 - lt:fix bind-to-device for tracker announces and UPnP
 - lt:rename peer_tos setting to peer_dscp
 - lt:fix bdecode support for large strings (>= 100 MB)

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.6.1-build-706/)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/163977/195230995-7f9873cb-5ad5-46bd-92ed-641afa338759.png)
[Photo by Mathias Reding](https://unsplash.com/photos/IEpyWlEEoQ4)

name: frostwire-android-2.6.0-build-705
body:
# FrostWire 2.6.0 build 705 - SEP/09/2022
 - Telluride Video Page Search is here.
 - Faster more responsive keyword search.
 - 703: Simpler, more robust Python runtime startup
 - 703: Better handling of no search results on video url
 - 704: com.applovin:applovin-sdk:11.4.2
 - 704: com.mobilefuse.sdk:mobilefuse-adapter-applovin:1.2.5.0 (new)
 - 704: removed some unity dependencies lowering installer size by almost 3mb
 - 704: slightly faster app startup

# FrostWire 2.5.0 build 701 - AUG/14/2022
 - LESS IS MORE. The FrostWire we'd like to use is here.
 - Removal of annoying Interstitial ad display logic, video ads are only shown when user wants to remove ads for 30 minutes
 - Removal of "My Files", it's impossible to maintain across so many android versions and devices with the file management quicksand on android
 - "Downloads" opens the user's favorite Android File Explorer
 - Fixes issues where finished downloads would get re-inserted into the MediaStore
   giving users the impression the file had been downloaded multiple times
 - FrostWire will correctly handle opening music files from different file explorers as long as
   the music files have been scanned by the Android Media Store
 - Major code cleanup after removal of "My Files" fragments and activities
 - Finished download scanning issues solved for Android 10, 11 and 12.
 - Easy access to Google Play Subscriptions management.
 - Fixed soundcloud search performer.
 - com.android.tools.build:gradle:7.2.2
 - com.google.android.material:material:1.6.1
 - com.google.firebase:firebase-crashlytics-gradle:2.9.1
 - com.google.gms:google-services:4.3.13
 - androidx.annotation:annotation:1.4.0
 - com.unity3d.ads:unity-ads:4.2.1
 
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/163977/188022021-5c773070-7e4d-4e41-9090-84cc7dbf5176.png)
Free Photo by [Prateek Katyal](https://unsplash.com/@prateekkatyal), from New Delhi India, [available for hire](https://unsplash.com/@prateekkatyal)



[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.6.0-build-704/)

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.6.0-build-705/)

name: frostwire-android-2.5.0-build-701
body:
# FrostWire 2.5.0 build 701 - AUG/14/2022
 - LESS IS MORE. The FrostWire we'd like to use is here.
 - Removal of annoying Interstitial ad display logic, video ads are only shown when user wants to remove ads for 30 minutes
 - Removal of "My Files", it's impossible to maintain across so many android versions and devices with the file management quicksand on android
 - "Downloads" opens the user's favorite Android File Explorer
 - Fixes issues where finished downloads would get re-inserted into the MediaStore
   giving users the impression the file had been downloaded multiple times
 - FrostWire will correctly handle opening music files from different file explorers as long as
   the music files have been scanned by the Android Media Store
 - Major code cleanup after removal of "My Files" fragments and activities
 - Finished download scanning issues solved for Android 10, 11 and 12.
 - Easy access to Google Play Subscriptions management.
 - Fixed soundcloud search performer.
 - com.android.tools.build:gradle:7.2.2
 - com.google.android.material:material:1.6.1
 - com.google.firebase:firebase-crashlytics-gradle:2.9.1

body:
# FrostWire 2.5.0 build 696 - AUG/02/2022
 - LESS IS MORE. The FrostWire we'd like to use is here.
 - Removal of annoying Interstitial ad display logic, video ads are only shown when user wants to remove ads for 30 minutes

name: frostwire-desktop-6.9.8-build-312
body:
# frostwire (6.9.8) stable; urgency=high
  * Java Runtime Environment 18.0.1 update
  * TorLock search fixed
  * Removed torrent-paradise.ml, moved to IPFS, no longer works with JSON api
  * Telluride Build 22
  * com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:4.9.3
  * org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter:5.8.2
  * jlibtorrent 1.2.16.0 (boost 1.79, openssl 1.1.1n)
  * lt:upgrade to boost 1.79
  * lt:openssl 1.1.1n upgrade
  * lt:fix bdecode support for large strings (>= 100 MB)
  * lt:send User-Agent field in anonymous mode
  * lt:fix python binding for settings_pack conversion
  * lt:fix DHT announce timer issue
  * lt:use DSCP_TRAFFIC_TYPE socket option on windows
  * lt:update default ToS setting according to RFC 8622
  * lt:keep trying to announce to trackers even when all fail
  * lt:don't disable announcing from local endpoints because of temporary failures
  * lt:fix issue in parsing UPnP XML response with multiple forwarding services

 -- FrostWire Team <contact@frostwire.com>  Mon, 25 Apr 2022 13:03:00 -0600

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-desktop-6.9.8-build-312/)

name: frostwire-android-2.4.8-build-691
body:
The 420 release.

# FrostWire 2.4.8 build 691 - APR/20/2022
 - TorLock search fixed
 - Removed torrent-paradise.ml, moved to IPFS, no longer works with JSON api
 - com.android.billingclient:billing:4.1.0
 - Expose settings_pack.validate_https_trackers with SettingsPack::validateHttpsTrackers methods
 - Privacy improvement: App no longer requires asking user for location
 - lt:upgrade to boost 1.79
 - lt:openssl 1.1.1n upgrade
 - lt:fix bdecode support for large strings (>= 100 MB)
 - lt:send User-Agent field in anonymous mode
 - lt:fix python binding for settings_pack conversion
 - lt:fix DHT announce timer issue
 - lt:use DSCP_TRAFFIC_TYPE socket option on windows
 - lt:update default ToS setting according to RFC 8622
 - lt:keep trying to announce to trackers even when all fail
 - lt:don't disable announcing from local endpoints because of temporary failures
 - lt:fix issue in parsing UPnP XML response with multiple forwarding services
 
 ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/163977/164790982-a4aed354-ae45-4168-8f48-ce7fd05f5e18.png)


[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.4.8-build-691/)

name: frostwire-android-2.4.7-build-690
body:
![Screen Shot 2022-02-18 at 10 46 44 AM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/163977/154735430-bd00a79c-b562-4799-ba5a-6ac104370792.png)


# FrostWire 2.4.7 build 690 - FEB/18/2022
```
 - fixes a crash on audio player screen when rotating to landscape
 - libtorrent: turn off tracker certificate validation on jlibtorrent to increase
   data availability on network until issues in libtorrent finding correct
   location of root certs is solved
 - removed mopub third party library
 - AppLovin Max 11.1.2 integration
 - androidx.media2:media2-*:1.2.1
 ```
 

 

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.4.7-build-690/)

name: frostwire-desktop-6.9.7-build-311
body:
frostwire (6.9.7) stable; urgency=high
  * New mplayer 12.0.5/ffmpeg 4.2.1 build.
  * macOS arm64 and x86_64 fwplayer builds
  * Telluride Cloud Video Downloader build 21
  * jlibtorrent 1.2.15.1 (boost 1.78, openssl 1.1.1m)
  * lt:don't disable announcing from local endpoints because of temporary failures
  * lt:fix issue in parsing UPnP XML response with multiple forwarding services
  * lt:cache DNS lookups for SOCKS5 proxy
  * lt:fix stalled pieces on disk-full errors
  * lt:fix build configuration issue on NetBSD, OpenBSD and DragonFly
  * lt:make UTF-8 sanitization a bit stricter. This will re-write invalid UTF-8 code points encoding surrogate pairs
  * lt:fix restoring last_seen_complete from resume data
  * lt:fix issue on MacOS where the DHT was not restarted on a network-up notification
  * lt:make remove_torrent flags be treated as flags (instead of an enum)
 -- FrostWire Team <contact@frostwire.com>  Thu, 6 Jan 2022 10:04:00 -0600


[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-desktop-6.9.7-build-311/frostwire-6.9.7.windows.github.exe/download)

name: frostwire-android-2.4.5-build-688
body:
### FrostWire 2.4.5 build 688 - JAN/07/2022
 - jlibtorrent 1.2.15.1 (boost 1.78, openssl 1.1.1m)
 - lt:don't disable announcing from local endpoints because of temporary failures
 - lt:fix issue in parsing UPnP XML response with multiple forwarding services
 - lt:cache DNS lookups for SOCKS5 proxy
 - lt:fix stalled pieces on disk-full errors
 - lt:fix build configuration issue on NetBSD, OpenBSD and DragonFly
 - lt:make UTF-8 sanitization a bit stricter. This will re-write invalid UTF-8 code points encoding surrogate pairs
 - lt:fix restoring last_seen_complete from resume data
 - lt:fix issue on MacOS where the DHT was not restarted on a network-up notification
 - lt:make remove_torrent flags be treated as flags (instead of an enum)

[![Download FrostWire](https://a.fsdn.com/con/app/sf-download-button)](https://sourceforge.net/projects/frostwire/files/frostwire-android-2.4.5-build-688/frostwire-android-release-2.4.5-b688-plus.apk/download)

name: frostwire-desktop-6.9.6-build-310
body:
# frostwire (6.9.6) stable; urgency=high
  * Option to turn off auto-pasting URLs and magnets in the clipboard to search textbox
  * JDK 17 compatibility update
  * Includes JDK 17 runtime
  * Linux installers now include JDK runtime. No more Java not found issues for Linux users
  * com.google.re2j:re2j:1.6
  * com.google.code.gson:gson:2.8.8
  * com.squareup.okhttp3:okhttp:4.9.2
  * org.junit.jupiter:junit-jupiter:5.8.1
  * Telluride Cloud Video Downloader build 18

 -- FrostWire Team <contact@frostwire.com>  Sat, 20 Nov 2021 09:39:05 -0600
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/163977/143052881-dfc8371a-8c89-4744-b70f-4b5d86da1107.png)
[Free Picture by Fabrizio Conti](https://unsplash.com/photos/EJQlF0GIvq8)
